Summary As a Professional Engineer with training in electrical an computer engineering, I have found that completely understanding an existing system is required before designing a replacement. 
 
My background includes over 20 years of working at Intel in microcontroller system applications, field training and product validation. I have been involved in projects from microwatts to megawats and DC to light, covering electronics, power, audio, HVAC and computer systems. 
 
Energy costs are a big portion of many budgets. I am focuing in this area and using my broad engineering background to save clients 10% to 20% on their electric bills. 
I am also assisting small businesses and non-profits with computer sytem architecture, ensuring they get a system optimized for their business needs and budget. 
 
Specialties: In additon to Computer Hardware I have also worked on embedded software, analog design projects, RF projects, and audio/stage projects. My current focus is Energy Conservation.
